frontend:
    VITE_PORT=4000
    VITE_API_TARGET=https://localhost:3000
    VITE_WS_TARGET=wss://localhost:3000
    HOST=localhost
    VITE_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRATION_MINUTES=15
    VITE_BALL_INITIAL_SPEED=0.4
    VITE_BALL_SPEED_FACTOR=1.07
    VITE_BALL_MAX_SPEED=0.9
    VITE_PADDLE_HEIGHT=0.3
    VITE_PADDLE_SPEED=0.7
    VITE_MAX_BOUNCE_ANGLE=60
    VITE_BALL_RADIUS=0.015
